interfaces

Interface Vehicle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExternalVehicle, HighwayVehicle

    public interface Vehicle
    Public interface for Vehicle objects.
    Author:
    anita

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void arrived()
      Marks the vehicle as arrived at its destination for the graphics.
      double getArrivalTime()
      Returns the time at which the vehicle arrived at the end of its current road.
      int getCurrRandPath()
      Returns an index for the next road to be entered if the vehicle is an external vehicle.
      Road getCurrRoad()
      Returns the current road of the vehicle.
      int getID()
      Returns the ID of the vehicle.
      Road getNextRoad()
      Returns the next road that the vehicle will enter.
      Path getPath()
      Get the path of the vehicle.
      int getType()
      Returns the type of the vehicle (highway or external)
      boolean isArrived()
      Checks whether the vehicle has arrived at its destination.
      boolean isPathSet()
      Returns true if the vehicle has a set path, false if not.
      int isScheduled()
      Returns 1 if the vehicle has been scheduled to enter an intersection, 0 otherwise.
      void move()
      Moves the vehicle in the graphics.
      void render(int w, int h, double minLat, double maxLat, double minLon, double maxLon, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      Render for graphics
      void setArrivalTime(double t)
      Sets the time that the vehicle arrives at its current road.
      void setAsArrived()
      Sets the vehicle as having arrived at its destination.
      void setCurrRandPath(int e)
      Sets the index foe the next road to be entered if the vehicle is an external vehicle.
      void setPath(Path path)
      Set the path of the vehicle.
      void setScheduled(int s)
      Set whether the vehicle is scheduled to enter an intersection
      void updateRoad()
      Updates the the vehicle's location in its path.
